name: The Jest Of Life 25/25
description:
Title: "The Jest Of Life” 2021
Oil on Canvas, 30" X 24"
 
You play, you laugh.
You have great fun.
Then you're knocked down,
Face hits the ground.
The jest of life. 
You shake your head,
You look around. 
It's safe! You're up and back
On the playground. 
The jest of life.
You play, but cautiously. 
Your laughter isn't loud.
And then you find yourself again 
With heavy bruises on the ground. 
The jest of life. 

The painting’s making process can be viewed at
https://youtu.be/IW1e4fYtgz4
